short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension for quickly adding pages to your Sooner list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension and shortcut for saving links to Sooner, your personal, self-cleaning reading list. 

Quickly save any page in the following ways:
    - Select the extension icon to add the current page
    - Right click any link and select 'Add to Sooner' to save the link

SOONER IS THE ANTI READING LIST
As you browse the web you can add pages to your Sooner list like any other. However, instead of allowing your reading list to balloon into an overwhelming pile of links and articles that you'll probably never read, Sooner automatically removes links a few days after they're added.  This keeps your list neat and tidy with relevant things you care about right now.

Get the app at https://sooner.app

Privacy Policy
https://sooner.app/privacy
